info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 3:14PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Eddy and southern Lea Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 313 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles west of Jal, moving south at 15 mph. Another was locatd just north of Malaga. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jal, Loving, Jal Airport, Malaga and Bennett. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Very heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
